remarks: The span of the singleton of a subspace member is included in the subspace.  ( ~ spansnss analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)
statement:
lspsnss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsnss.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnss $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S /\ X e. U ) -> ( N ` { X } ) C_ U ) $.
